sentence.Network_en: Books are often stacked in higgledy-piggledy piles on the floor.
sentence.Network_cn: 书本经常乱七八糟地堆在地板上。

sentence.Network_en: A whole valley of boulders tossed higgledy-piggledy as though by some giant.
sentence.Network_cn: 整个山谷里巨石翻滚，就像有巨人在狂扔乱掷。

sentence.Network_en: Files were strewn higgledy-piggledy over the floor.
sentence.Network_cn: 文件乱七八糟地扔了一地。

PerfectNetExp.abs: 英语中的颜色与心情_百度知道 ... 憔悴 haggard 杂乱无章；乱七八糟 higgledy-piggledy 心情沉重的；悲哀的 heavyhearted.

英语词汇... ... Flip-flops 平底人字拖鞋 Higgledy-piggledy 紊乱的，杂乱无章的 Have a crush on someone 迷恋、喜欢某人.
单词记忆碎片&nbsp;15&nbsp;_keeey_新浪博客... ... nival 的拼写很“像” higgledy-piggledy 杂乱无章地(的)、 razzle-dazzle 哄闹、.

derivation.yuyuan_name: late 16th cent.: rhyming jingle, probably with reference to the irregular herding together of pigs

entry.tran: 乱七八糟的;杂乱无章的
entry.def: If you say that things are higgledy-piggledy, you mean that they are very disorganized and untidy.

example.ex: Books are often stacked in higgledy-piggledy piles on the floor.
example.tran: 书本经常乱七八糟地堆在地板上。

auth_sentence.content: These few notes however are made to count through their higgledy-piggledy repetition.
auth_sentence.res_content: These few notes however are made to count through their higgledy-piggledy repetition.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: These few notes however are made to count through their higgledy-piggledy repetition.

auth_sentence.content: Higgledy-piggledy rhododendrons covered a hilly bank.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: Higgledy-piggledy rhododendrons covered a hilly bank.

auth_sentence.content: The new-comers' wagon was piled higgledy-piggledy with stretchers, chairs, wooden boxes, pots and pans.
auth_sentence.res_content: The new-comers' wagon was piled higgledy-piggledy with stretchers, chairs, wooden boxes, pots and pans.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: The new-comers' wagon was piled higgledy-piggledy with stretchers, chairs, wooden boxes, pots and pans.

sentences.en: There is something delightfully and liberatingly ludicrous about parading higgledy-piggledy in a line of walkers of all shapes and sizes.
sentences.cn: 乱七八糟地是在由形态各异的人组成的游行队伍里，这倒真是件滑稽有趣的事。
